itemDisplayName: Create MultipleVMs in ExistingVNET and Storageaccount with 2 NIC
description: This template allows you to create multiple VM's(Windows or Ubuntu) with 2 NICs in an availablity set with  existing Virtual network , existing storage account configuration
summary: This template allows you to create multiple VM's(Windows or Ubuntu) with 2 NICs in an availablity set with  existing Virtual network , existing storage account configuration
